com.tictactoe.game

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tictactoe.game.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends Object
    A board for a game of Tic Tac Toe. Represents the current state of the game and which cells have been selected by whom.

      • isWinner

        public boolean isWinner(Game.PlayerLetter player)
        Compare the current state of the game board with the possible winning combinations to determine a win condition. This should be checked at the end of each turn.
        Parameters:
        player -
        Returns:

      • isTied

        public boolean isTied()
        Determines if the game is tied. The game is considered tied if there is no winner and all cells have been selected.
